sentence: As the President stated last night and in his inauguration address,  the golden age of America is just beginning.

This run wraps up a prolific high school  career for Cooper Lehman, who will be continuing to play tennis at the  University of Mary Washington, and it shows great promise for Braylen  Garcia who is just beginning his high school playing career.
There is so much more I could mention, but the best of all of this is  that it is just beginning.
